title: Understanding Unfolding Case Studies
text: An unfolding case study is a dynamic scenario that evolves over time, providing a realistic and complex situation for learners to analyze and respond to.

hintAnswer: an example of a client care scenario where the situation changes
title: Identifying Characteristics of Unfolding Case Studies
text: What is a key characteristic of an unfolding case study?
choices: an example of a client care scenario where the situation changes
a client care scenario where the situation is fixed
an example of a client care scenario where the situation is complex
